titles.title: FASIT Provisions of 1993
To facilitate the creation of Financial Asset Securitization Investment Trusts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2433)

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Introduced. FASIT Provisions of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the creation of financial asset securitization investment trusts. Allows such trusts to consist of: (1) money or debt obligations; (2) property acquired in connection with certain defaults held by the trust; (3) hedges or guarantees against economic risks associated with debts issued or held by the trust; or (4) ownership interests in other such trusts. Provides for taxing the income of such trusts in a manner similar to corporations. Sets forth other rules for such trusts.
